headline: Casino Operator Stocks Q4 Earnings: Monarch (NASDAQ:MCRI) Firing on All Cylinders
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Monarch (NASDAQ:MCRI) and the best and worst performers in the casino operator industry.
